Name: Last Hope
About the game: A survival mini-game, power your life support until help arrives! Your ship explodes and you are left desperately clutching to a tiny planet in an attempt to power your suit until help arrives. Clutch to life in the eerily serene beauty of space with an epic orchestral soundtrack, Last Hope will have your heart racing in all the best ways. - Last 3 minutes, 5 minutes, 10 minutes, 3 minutes, or 2 hours for the ultimate test. - Engaging and relaxing.
Meta Title: Last Hope: Dec 31, 2017, Ben Lovegrove and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Last Hope? Check out the release date (Dec 31, 2017), developer insights from Ben Lovegrove, and a complete game summary.
